content: 0.01BTC, repaid at +10% in terms of BTC.In part to pay a domain I have to renew, in part as a salary advance which I receive the first week of the month. To be sent to my staked address on the forum: 12hYBWiPqfwdveGzpbRdGxeqnoMcNvGNSq.Thanks and happy to chat, simply message me.
